title: John McGraw chemical altered I think
author: Robert1995

posts.post_title: John McGraw chemical altered I think
posts.post_content:
Looking for some help with this card. Maybe a value?[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=426083&d=1605405434[/IMG]


     $80 shipped if anyone wants it. 

      $75.  Pwe
Maybe like $75?  It has a unique look and maybe someone would like it for that reason.

I have seen about a dozen of these sort of cards - all with some sort of back issues.  Very likely due to chemical reaction not printing flaws.  However it still has value. Even a totally beaten HOFer is worth $50.  Thus is likely worth slightly more (but not much more) than that.
